name: Garrus
quote: It's so much easier to see the world in black and white. Gray? I don't know what to do with gray.

name: Shepard
quote: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite store on the Citadel.

name: Liara
quote: It is important to remember our history... Even if those memories make us uncomfortable.

name: Wrex
quote: That's why I love hanging out with you guys! Why shoot something once when you can shoot it 46 more times?

name: Ashley
quote: Nothing like a nice relaxing stroll on the beach, blasting bad guys with my boomstick.

name: Kaiden
quote: Sometimes the way a thing goes down does matter, Shepard. Later, when you have to live with yourself. Knowing that you acted with integrity, then it matters.

name: Joker
quote: Hey, Commander, y'know I had my doubts about the council, but after years of ignoring your warning, they're finally willing to step up and tell us they just can't help.

name: Edi
quote: Do not worry, Shepard. I only forget to recycle the Normandy's oxygen when I've discovered something truly interesting

name: James
quote: Rachni!? Of all the... It's like you have the opposite of a horseshoe up your ***.

name: Kasumi
quote: I swear to god, I didn't touch anything!

name: Mordin
quote: Had to be me; somebody else might have gotten it wrong

name: Grunt
quote: I don’t remember anything after I ate the lamp.

name: Tali
quote: And I thought I had a good poker face.

name: Miranda
quote: Before we started this mission, I never would've questioned our goals...I just hope we made the right choice.

name: Jacob
quote: Good deed’s like pissing yourself in dark pants. Warm feeling but no one notices.

name: Samara
quote: At last, I am free. I am a ruined vessel of sorrow and regret, but I am free.

name: Thane
quote: The measure of an individual can be difficult to discern by actions alone.

name: Legion
quote: Does this unit have a soul?

name: Jack
quote: If I die, I'm haunting you, Shepard.

name: Zaeed
quote: Rage is a hell of an anesthetic.

name: Javik
quote: Throw it out the airlock.
